example.text: Senator Tuberville's reckless obstruction of senior military promotions is an anti-choice attempt to dictate what women do with their bodies & it hurts our national security. Playing politics at the expense of our military readiness is absolutely wrong. Time to end this charade. [[url]]

Fentanyl is a deadly drug that has devastated far too many NV families. On #FentanylAwarenessDay, I’m taking action through a bipartisan bill to declare a national emergency & stop fentanyl from entering the US by sanctioning & dismantling international drug trafficking rings.

We must protect the diverse wildlife that rely on the outdoors and critical habitats in Nevada. That's why I helped introduce bipartisan legislation to ensure state wildlife agencies have the necessary resources to implement conservation efforts. [[url]]

Senator Tuberville's reckless obstruction of senior military promotions is an anti-choice attempt to dictate what women do with their bodies & it hurts our national security. Playing politics at the expense of our military readiness is absolutely wrong. Time to end this charade. [[url]]

No one should ever have to experience this kind of trauma – being scared for their lives during a lockdown. My thoughts are with the victim, his family, and the entire school community. I'm fighting every day to prevent gun violence. We must do more. [[url]]
